articles.title: Hand Sanitizer Is Harming Kids' Eyes - Newsmax
articles.description: The explosive rise in use of alcohol-based hand sanitizers during the COVID-19 pandemic has had a dangerous, unintended consequence: eye injuries among children.
articles.content:
